backend/main.mo: Defines game state, dialogue nodes, activities, memorable moments, letters, and provides functions to start or continue a saved game.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with linked source files, components, tests, and confidence metadata for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manages main screen navigation between title, game, settings, and credits with theme and toaster providers.
Defines activity metadata including trust effects, descriptions, and moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Zustand audio manager handling background music, volume, and mute state with persistence.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Defines a 3D Puro character with idle animation, hover effects, and click-triggered dialogue.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Implements touch-based joystick and look controls for mobile devices.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, joystick, and look inputs into normalized movement and camera control state.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Provides a list of customizable items with descriptions and allowed placement locations.
Defines a branching dialogue tree with trust effects and optional requirements.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Hosts the 3D scene, HUD, UI panels, audio, and pause logic, initializing the game on load.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates letter responses based on detected keywords using predefined message sets.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide-and-seek game where the player guesses Puro’s hiding spot and trust adjusts based on success.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Launches and switches between different minigames, returning to a menu when finished.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a selected story moment with its scene text and a close option.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data including titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library environment, handles player movement, and displays objects including Puro and customizations.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing trust, progress, UI state, and actions for game progression and persistence.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Contains ending definitions with trust thresholds and a helper to retrieve the correct ending.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Shows the final ending based on trust, unlocks it, and offers restart or return options.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Displays a list of activities the player can perform, applying trust changes and unlocking moments before closing the menu.
Shows discovered customization items and lets the player place them in the library while listing already placed items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Handles branching dialogue with trust-based choices, updating the dialogue node and adjusting trust levels.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Allows writing letters and viewing responses, validating input and generating delayed auto‑responses.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Lists memorable moments, showing locked or unlocked states and allowing playback of unlocked moments.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides pause options including quick-access menus, settings, and progress reset, with navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Offers audio settings such as mute and volume control with a button to return to the previous screen.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays the current trust level with a labeled progress bar and color-coded status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that call backend game actions and invalidate the gameState query on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for a warm-themed light and dark mode UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays the game's credits screen with description, features, footer link, and a back button.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the main title screen with new game, continue, settings, and credits buttons over a background image.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the game’s current design state, including narrative focus, core systems, art requirements, and known issues. Lists implemented features such as the 3D library scene, mobile controls, relationship system, dialogue trees, and daily activities.
